title: ObjectHint
description: A hint to the structure of an `Object`.

type.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@type` keyword.

id.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@id` keyword.

length.description: The number of entries in the object.
length.$comment:
For large object with many entries, to save space, `keys` and `values` may not be
complete (i.e. they may have lengths less than this `length` property).

keys.description: The keys of the object's entries.

values.description: Hints to the values of the object's entries.
